ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Rejecting too many hops
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Gordon Thanks for reply. I mean I want to crawl to a specific path(number of / from hostname) from seed. Actually I have to download only .exe,.zip,.msi
